question: How to implement a function that calculates the factorial of a number using recursion, similar to the mathematical definition n! = n × (n-1)!?
How to implement matrix multiplication following the mathematical formula C[i][j] = Σ(A[i][k] * B[k][j])?
How to implement binary search algorithm based on the mathematical concept of divide and conquer?
How to implement the Euclidean algorithm for finding GCD based on gcd(a, b) = gcd(b, a mod b)?
How to implement Fibonacci using dynamic programming with F(n) = F(n-1) + F(n-2)?
How to implement a function that checks if a number is prime using the property that n is prime iff it has no divisors between 2 and √n?
